description.value:
Arch-Militant

The Arch-Militant is the master of arms aboard a Rogue Trader's vessel, a warrior without peer who serves as bodyguard, weapons master, and leader of soldiers. Through countless battles and endless training, they have honed their combat skills to perfection. Whether leading boarding actions, defending the ship from invaders, or standing at their lord's side in the most dire circumstances, the Arch-Militant is death incarnate.

Starting Skills

Common Lore (War) (Int), Dodge (Ag), Intimidate (S), Scholastic Lore (Tactica Imperialis) (Int), Secret Tongue (Military) (Int), Speak Language (Low Gothic) (Int)

Starting Talents

Basic Weapon Training (Universal), Pistol Weapon Training (Universal), Melee Weapon Training (Universal), Thrown Weapon Training (Universal), Sound Constitution, Weapon Master

Starting Gear

Good-craftsmanship hellgun or best-craftsmanship hunting rifle or two bolt pistols, plus one good-craftsmanship primitive melee weapon of choice with the mono upgrade. Micro-bead, void suit, enforcer light carapace armour, bolt shell keepsake, medikit, manacles. Data-slate full of wanted bounties or arms coffer or 3 doses of stimm.

Special Ability

Weapon Master: Choose one (and only one!) class of weapon. The Arch-militant gains a +10% bonus to hit, +2 to damage, and +2 initiative when using a weapon of his chosen class in Combat.
